ProductInfo.Features:
100% Brand new and high quality.
The new 7 inch Touch Screen Tablet PC runs on the Android 4.0 Operating System with full access to Google Play store and thousands of apps and Games. The 7" screen has a 16:9 screen resolution making it easier to view more document and boos in one screen without haing to scroll up and down.
The 7" Android 4.0 Tablet come with the superfast 1.2 GHz CPU and 512MB RAM allowing you to run multiple applications at   once without rurning speed or performance. This PC provides excellent compatibility and entertainment functions! Best choice for you! Do not miss it!
800 x 480 pixels High definition display screen
Support wireless access to get Internet anywhere covered by Wi-Fi hot spots
